page.title: 14Events in the villages.
page.content: Two of the villages in the area did hold special events regularly.Firstly Alverton its population of no more than 20 residents revived the Alverton feast which is held September.This celebration includes music and drama in the form of a parade,pageant and concert in Staunton church which has close links historically.The whole community eat together in 1 of Alvertons larger houses.Shelton instituted a tulip festival some years ago where the whole village was covered by growing tulips and by flower head displays showing village life.The event was started to raise money for the church and was so successful that it was made an annual event for several years,but the people found the event strenuous and stopped it recently but the bulbs continue to flower still causing interest.
